solution.text:
Initial weight = 2kg
Its weight increases by a power of 2 each year.
Hence, the weight of the bear after two years will be \((2^2)^2\)
\(=2^4\)
\(=_{{2**4}}_\)

content.text: A new born bear weighs 2 kg. How many kilograms might a two year old bear weigh if its weight increases by the power of 2 each year?
